    <metadata>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Fotoaparat</string>
            <string language="en">Camera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kamera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Appareil-photo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Câmera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Macchina fotografica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φωτογραφική μηχανή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cámara fotográfica</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Zgradba fotoaparata in vpliv različnih leč na možnost izostritve in velikost slike.</string>
            <string language="en">Optical view on photo camera - lenses, focusing image and image size.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fotoaparat</string>
            <string language="en">camera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">optična aplikacija</string>
            <string language="en">optical application</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Optische Ansicht über Fotokamera - Objektive, 
fokussierenbild und Bildgröße.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vue optique sur l'appareil-photo de photo - 
objectifs, image se focalisante et taille d'image.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vista ótica na câmera da foto - lentes, imagem 
focalizando e tamanho da imagem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vista ottica sulla macchina fotografica della 
foto - obiettivi, immagine di focalizzazione e formato di immagine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οπτική όψη σχετικά με τη φωτογραφική μηχανή 
φωτογραφιών - φακοί, στρέφοντας την εικόνα και το μέγεθος 
εικόνας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Opinión óptica sobre la cámara fotográfica de
la foto - lentes, imagen que se enfoca y talla de la imagen.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kamera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
